name: 3DFPS Shooter
description:
This is my 3D shooter project tutorial for CAS 117.

Planned Modifications:

1. Adding 1 or 2 more levels.

2. New level music to keep the game fresh.

3. Changing the movements of the player.

4. Altering each enemies  to change their health movement patterns .

5. Change how the mountain range looks.
